title: Software Engineer
text: Developed integration with WhatsApp messaging using AngularJS, RXjs and Redux.
Created and maintained new features across site using AngularJS, Firebase/Firestore and Ruby on Rails.
Developed and published application within ServiceNow to allow customers to seamlessly use our application within the CRM.

title: Product Software Developer
text: Developed functionality to facilitate integration of JasperReports to internal reporting system using Perl, JavaScript and Java
Led team to upgrade ACA electronic fulfillment module by developing and updating the internal system
Upgraded and maintained DC compliance module using Perl, C and JavaScript
Worked on UI improvements across our application using JavaScript and Dojo

title: Programmer Analyst Intern
text: Developed 121 web scraping scripts that added over 30,000 job postings to our site using VB.Net
Improved development time by developing scraping templates for third party job boards
